short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds buttons to search queries on ChatGPT and Perplexity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üîç Seamlessly bridge Google Search with ChatGPT!

Enhance your search experience with this simple yet powerful extension that adds a sleek "Search on ChatGPT" button directly within your Google search interface.

Key Features:
‚Ä¢ One-Click Access: Instantly transfer your Google search query to ChatGPT
‚Ä¢ Clean Integration: Beautifully integrated button right in your Google search bar
‚Ä¢ Zero Configuration: Works right out of the box - no setup required
‚Ä¢ Privacy Focused: No data collection or storage

How It Works:
1. Search anything on Google as you normally would
2. Click the "Search on ChatGPT" button next to your search
3. Instantly open ChatGPT with your search query

Perfect for:
‚Ä¢ Students seeking detailed explanations
‚Ä¢ Researchers wanting AI-powered insights
‚Ä¢ Anyone looking to quickly compare Google results with ChatGPT's knowledge
‚Ä¢ Professionals seeking comprehensive answers to complex queries

Save time and enhance your research by seamlessly combining the power of Google Search and ChatGPT in one smooth workflow!

Note: Requires a ChatGPT account to access results.
